overview.en: Polis (POLIS) is a cryptocurrency and operates on the Ethereum platform. Users are able to generate POLIS through the process of mining. Polis has a current supply of 9,831,890.56695441. The last known price of Polis is 0.44000444 USD and is down -8.40 over the last 24 hours. It is currently trading on 6 active market(s) with $2,728.25 traded over the last 24 hours. More information can be found at https://polispay.org/.
